entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
